title: Breaking the habit
creator_credit: John Korty, Henry Jacobs, American Cancer Society and Korty Films
brief_description: With the theme: “the self-delusion of the cigarette smoker”, records a conversation between two cartoon characters, George, the “quitting” smoker, and his friend. Concludes on a serious but hopeful note, pointing out that the chances of developing serious diseases decrease the moment you stop smoking.
